title: Client claims I am still in game and need to reconnect to it after game has ended
body: Our game ended about 15 minutes ago now. Nexus exploded, got the Defeat splash across the screen. Exited out, couldn't see stats, and went to main menu. Tried to requeue, got told I was still in game. So I relogged, and now I get a message saying I abandoned the game and have to reconnect.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm assuming this has resolved itself by now?

For future reference, this occurs when your client doesn't receive the proper "Game over" message from the server or the server isn't correctly finishing games, normally these issues rectify themselves within 30 minutes-1 hour.

Yeah, it's cleared now. 

It took nearly 3 hours to clear. From just after 9pm WST to nearly midnight.

Sounds like it might've been the servers fault then, oh well at least it's fixed now.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
